mapper.select: select member_id from teacher where member_id = #{memberId}

select login.member_id AS memberId ,login.member_level AS memberLevel ,mem.member_name AS memberName ,mem.member_email AS memberEmail ,mem.member_phone AS memberPhone ,tea.course_no AS courseNo ,sub.subject_name AS subjectName ,co.course_name AS courseName ,tea.teacher_registered_date AS teacherRegisteredDate from member_login AS login ,member AS mem ,teacher AS tea ,course AS co ,subject AS sub where login.member_id = mem.member_id and login.member_id = tea.member_id and tea.course_no = co.course_no and co.subject_no = sub.subject_no and login.member_level = #{memberLevel}
